Translations.Text: Arau tomara ocarata bibadamana lokasakalara sambada ahi pa'ichene? Yetiya sihamte praacira baga'i ibadatara tha'ita praraesa karaichila

Yetiya te'omloke da'udara ocarata praraesa karaile, tetiya te'om te'omlokaka dekhi bhaya khale. Te'omloke ka’le, ‘bhaya nakaraiba, ami duta bibadamana paksa. Amara ijane sijanara oparata simalanghana karaiche, eteke apuni amara majata n'yaya bicara karai diyaka, abicara nakaraiba arau amaka sathika patha pradarsana karaka

‘Niscaya e'om mora bhatr. E'omra niraanabbai ta bheraa ache; arau mora ache kerala eta bheraa. Tathapi'o te'om kaya, ‘se'ito moka di diya’, arau tarkata te'om mora oparata praadhan'ya bistara karaiche’

Da'ude ka’le, ‘tomara bheraatoka te'omra bheraaborara lagata yukta karaara dabi karai te'om tomara prati an'yaya karaiche. Niscaya yautha ansidarabilakara bahute'i ijane sijanara oparata simalanghana karae, kerala te'omlokara bahirae yisakale imana aniche arau satkarma karaiche, kintu te'omloka sankhyata ati takara’. Da'ude buji pale ami te'omka paraiksahe karailo. Tara pichata te'om nija pratipalakara ocarata ksama praarthana karaile arau nata hai chajadaha aranata ha’la, arau te'omra abhimukhi ha’la
Tetiya ami te'omka ksama karai dilo. Niscaya amara ocarata te'omra babe ache naikatyara maryada arau uttama pratyarartanasthala

‘He da'uda! Niscaya ami tomaka prthiraita pratinidhi bana'icho, eteke tumi manuhara majata subicara karaa arau prabrttira anusarana nakaraiba, kiyano ene karaile i tomaka allahara pathara paraa bicyuta karaiba’. Niscaya yisakale allahara pathara paraa bicyuta haya sihamtara babe ache kathina sasti, karana sihamte bicara dirasaka paharai gaiche

Arau ami akasa, prthirai lagate e'i duyora majata thaka kono bastuke'i anarthaka srsti karaa na'i. E'ito dharana kerala sihamtara yisakale kupharai karaiche, eteke yisakale kupharai karaiche sihamtara babe ache agnira durbhoga
Yisakale imana aniche arau satkarma karaiche ami te'omlokaka prthiraita biparyaya srstikaraisakalara samatulya ganya karaima neki? Ne ami muttakbisakalaka papistabilakara darae ganya karaima
ekhana barakatamaya puthi, yito ami tomara prati aratirna karaicho, yate manuhe iyara ayatasamuhata gabhirabharae cinta karae arau yate bodhasakti sampanna byaktisakale upadesa grahana karae
Arau ami da'udaka dana karaichilo chula'imana. Kimana ye uttama banda achila te'om! Niscaya te'om achila atisaya allaha abhimukhi
Smarana karaa, gadhuli yetiya te'omra sanmukhata drautagami utkrsta asbaraajika upasthapana karaa ha’la
tetiya te'om ka’le, ‘ma'i dekhuna mora pratipalakara smaranara paraa bimukha hai aisbarya praitita magna hai paraicho, ipine surya pardara amrata guci gaiche
‘e'iboraka mora ocaralai ghuraa'i ana’. Tara pichata te'om se'iborara bharai arau dinita aghata karai jabeha karaibalai dharaile
Arasye ami chula'imanaka paraiksa karaichilo arau te'omra asanara oparata raakhichilo eti deha, tara pichata chula'imana amara abhimukhi ha’la
Te'om ka’le, ‘he mora raba! Moka ksama karai diya arau moka enekuraa ekhana raajya dana karaa yito mora pichata ana karao babe prayojya naha’ba. Niscaya tumi parama data’
Tetiya ami batahaka te'omra adhina karai dilo, yito te'omra adesata te'om ya’ta iccha karaichila se'i tha'ite mrdumandabharae prabahita haichila
arau (adhina karai dichilo) pratyeka attalika nirmanakarai arau dubarau chayatanaborako
sikalita arad'dha arau bahutake
E'ibora amara anugraha, eteke iyara paraa tumi anako dana karaiba paraa arau nijara babe'o samci thaba paraa. Iyara kono hicaba diba nalage
Arau niscaya te'omra babe ache amara ocarata naikatyara maryada arau uttama pratyarartanasthala
Arau smarana karaa, amara banda a'iyyubaka, yetiya te'om nija pratipalakaka ahbana karai kaichila, ‘niscaya moka cayatane yantrana arau kastata pela'iche’
(ma'i te'omka ka’lo,) ‘tumi nijara bharairae bhumita aghata karaa, eya haiche ga dhubara babe susitala pani arau paniya’
Arau ami te'omka dana karailo te'omra paraiyalabarga arau te'omlokara darae arau bahuto, amara phalara paraa anugrahasbaraupa arau bodhasakti sampanna lokasakalara babe upadesasbaraupa

Arau (ami te'omka adesa karailo) ‘tumi emuthi ghamha loraa arau se'itorae tumi koboraa tathapi'o sapata bhanga nakaraiba’. Niscaya ami te'omka dhairyasila pa'ichilo. Kimana ye uttama banda achila te'om! Niscaya te'om achila amara abhimukhi
Arau smarana karaa, amara banda ibraahima, ichahakba arau iyakubara katha, te'omloka ataye achila saktisali arau suksmadarsi
Niscaya ami te'omlokaka eta bisesa gunara adhikarai karaichilo, seya achila akhiraatara smarana
Arau niscaya te'omloka achila amara ocarata manonita uttama bandasakalara an'yatama
Arau smarana karaa, ichama'ila, ala-iyaca'a arau jula-kiphalara katha, e'omloka ataye achila sajjanasakalara antarbhukta
E'ito eta smarana. Niscaya muttakbisakalara babe ache uttama abasa
cirasthayi jannata, yara duraarasamuha te'omlokara babe unmukta
Tata te'omloke a'uji bahiba, tata te'omloke bahu dharanara phalamula arau paniya anibalai ka’ba
